trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Seekonk
There were no other sightings in Seekonk on or around March 3rd 2012
divs: sighting detailsnoticed two very bright lights in the distance in the southwest region of the sky over i-195. these lights appeared brighter than any star or airplane. (this area has heavy commercial airline traffic) did not have any features to indicate it was a air plain (running lights\headlights\etc.)the objects seemed to pulsate and slowly become dimmer or brighter. observed object through binoculars and noticed it was white to light green on top and had a purple hue on the bottom. at one point several small blinking lights discharged from the area around the brightest light, moved away from it, and then faded out. witnessed a similar event in this very spot and orientation about two years ago after driving home and seeing what i thought was a comet streaking down from the sky.
